name.ch: 全人精準健康生物資訊教育

department.ch: 生醫科學與工程學系系統生物與生物資訊碩士班
department.en: Master Program in Systems Biology and Bioinformatics, Department of Biomedical Sciences and Engineering

goal.ch: 高通量技術發展快速且應用日廣，使得生命科學研究對生物資訊技術的需求日增，本課程將介紹瞻技術與資料分析的應用與原理，涵蓋功能基因體及轉譯醫學、轉錄體學、癌症基因體學及藥物基因體學。
goal.en:
"The explosive growth of omics data has drastically increased the complexity of data analysis. The course positions bioinformatics at medical researches. The course integrated of heterogeneous omics data for biological interpretations and molecular targets for potential medical translation. Specifically, the course aims to:
bioinformatics tools/methods for the analyses of next-generation sequencing data and omics, including functional genomics and translation medicine, transcriptomics, cancer genomics, and pharmacogenomics."

outline.ch:
"1.基因體科技帶動台灣精準醫療發展
2.NGS在罕見疾病的現況與應用 I
3.NGS在罕見疾病的現況與應用 II
4.藥物基因體學 I
5.藥物基因體學 II
6.基於穿戴式裝置的醫用人工智慧軟體開發I
7..基於穿戴式裝置的醫用人工智慧軟體開發 II
8.健保資料庫介紹與應用
9.期中考
10.次世代定序癌症基因檢測的臨床應用
11.Linux 使用介紹與文字編輯器實作
12.國網中心大型主機PBS P ro 排程系統介紹與工作派送實作
13.常用的基因體分析程式指令從 QC 到Variant Calling
14.串起特定分析程式之工作流程
15.線上基因體生資應用工具介紹
16.全外顯子定序單點序列變異生資分析
17.全外顯子定序基因體拷貝數變異生資分析
18.期末考"
outline.en:
"1. Genome technology drives the development of precision medicine in Taiwan
2. Current status and application of NGS in rare diseases I
3. Current status and application of NGS in rare diseases I
4. pharmacogenomics I
5. pharmacogenomics II
6. Development of medical artificial intelligence software based on wearable
devices I
7. Development of medical artificial intelligence software based on wearable devices II
8. Introduction and application of health insurance database
9. Mid-term exam
10. The clinical application of next-generation sequencing cancer genetic testing
11.Linux introduction and text editor implementation
12. Introduction to the PBS Pro scheduling system for the mainframe of the State Grid Center and implementation of job delivery
13. Commonly used gene analysis program instructions from QC to Variant Calling
14. The workflow of stringing up specific analysis programs
15. Introduction to online genomics health resources application tools
16. Full exon sequencing and single point sequence variation analysis
17. Whole exon sequencing gene body copy number variation analysis of resources
18. Final exam"

gradMethod.ch: 出席 20% 期中考 30% 期末考 30% 報告 20%
